name: Hotelevator
description:
This was made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam.

Controls:

WASD to move, aim with mouse, left click to shoot, and E to interact.

You've just been invited to a fancy dinner party at the Hotelevator, only to realize it was a trap! Work your way up to Floor 6 to get revenge on whatever invited you. 

Shooting enemies fills up a bar that makes random things happen when it fills up. They can be good or bad things, so be careful.

Between each Floor, you will get a random stat buff, and so will the enemies.
